gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: Yueh, S. 2015. CLASIC07 PALS Backscatter Data. [indicate subset used]. Boulder, Colorado USA: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center. http://dx.doi.org/10.5067/75ZB400QV98N.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains backscatter data obtained by the Passive Active L-band System (PALS) microwave aircraft radar instrument as part of the Cloud and Land Surface Interaction Campaign 2007 (CLASIC07). Version Description: Initial Version

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Restriction Comment: These data are offered free of charge. You may use these data freely, provided that you cite NSIDC DAAC as the source, and provide an acknowledgment in any published papers.
